lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to show politeness.
  • Nice to meet you! - Used when you meet someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when parting.

items.explanation_en: A formal way to ask someone about their well-being.
A common question to initiate conversation.
A friendly expression of concern for someone's health.
A casual inquiry often used among friends.
A way to ask someone about their purpose for being somewhere.

items.en: It's a pleasure to meet you.
items.explanation_en: A polite expression used when meeting someone for the first time.
A question to check if someone is having a good time.
A way to learn more about someone's interests.

items.en: Do you have any plans for tonight?
items.explanation_en: A casual question to find out about someone's evening.
A friendly way to ask about someone's life.
